A. Bb × Bb

B. BB × BB and Bb × bb

C. bb × Bb

D. bb × bb

E. bb × BB

F. Bb × bb

G. Bb × BB

H. BB × Bb

I. BB × bb

J. BB × BB

Answer with only a single letter. Answer:<|im_end|>
